== Nattakam (CT) (628177) ==

Nattakam (CT) is a town in the [[Kottayam]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 22.34 sq. km. and harbouring 9778 households with total population of 38599 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kottayam]] is at a distance of 4 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 148 km. Male population is 18800 and female population is 19799. Scheduled Caste population is 2343 and Scheduled Tribes population is 206. Census Location Code of the town is 628177<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 58 km. Railway station is at Chingavanam at a distance of 4 km.
